column4: http://gnome-look.org/content/show.php/SolidSlate+Modified?content=44963
That's not a great pic.  Solid Slate Modified is basically all the stuff on the borders of the window.  Like the close, minimize, maximize buttons.
i'm guessing it's an emerald theme?
Yeah, I never bothered using the compiz stuff till I found that theme.
compiz doesn't really work on my computer
That's some african skins, one of which is elephant, that I use as a GDM greeter.  arunkale I'll PM you the themes I use.
That sux.
yup.. i have a new nvidia graphics card, but it doesn't work properly, so yeah

Basically, for window themes, I like all the "slate" variants.  Slate is basically a rip off of the Windows border themes, but I tell you, I hate Microsoft, but border themes is the one thing they did that I really like.
Did you get the nvidia driver installed okay?
There are many slate variants that aren't emerald, but I didn't like any of those as much.  But, I did like them.
yup, the driver has installed properly, but i can't get compiz to work well.. it's not a huge deal, but yeah, it's a little irritating
Just search on art.gnome.org for slate, and you'll find a bunch of them.
What's wrong with compiz on your box?  The nvidia driver should be the only hardware specific thing.
black screens, etc. the usual problems
I've never heard of those...  Maybe just cause I never had them, I never had to google for it.  Maybe it'll work better for you in Hardy??
AMD shouldn't make a difference.
yeah, maybe it will :)
You getting these PM's?
Here are the GDM themese I use: http://gnome-look.org/content/show.php/Africa+GDM+Themes?content=67562
